alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 8:25AM CST until February 28 at 2:24AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Sumter and Hale Counties. Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Pickens and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 102.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CST Saturday was 102.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 90.6 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
